name: No Time (itch) (BulletGrade)
description:
No Time

No Time is a difficult FPS Shooter where you play as an assassin who had been hired to kill a man who's creating an army of zombies and robots in a building. You find yourself in the middle of the building containing several enemies and zombies and thanks to your time slowing and dashing power, that will be a piece of cake.. Not exactly.

Controls
WASD to move around

Left Click to shoot

Right Click to slow time

R to Reload

Alphanumeric Minus to restart the game

Left Shift to dash (If you hear a beep after dashing, it means that you are ready to dash again.)

1 to equip Pistol

2 to equip SMG

3 to equip Shotgun

Source Code

The source code can be found below.

https://github.com/BulletGrade/No-Time/
